Q_DESC:
Compute the weighted score based on individual assignments scores. Let us say there are only 3 assignments & 2 exams, each with max score of 100. Respective weights are (10%, 10%, 10%, 35% and 35%) . First line contains the N number of student. followed 
by N students get the score for assignment1, get the score for assignment2, get the score for assignment3, get the score for exam1, get the score for exam2
